alert.note: Alert for Lower Clark Fork Region; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 7:13AM MST until November 22 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Ice accumulations of a trace to 0.03. * WHERE...I-90 East Missoula to Bearmouth, Highway 200 Trout Creek to Heron, I-90 Lookout Pass to Haugan, Missoula, Highway 200 Thompson Falls to Plains, Bitterroot Valley, Highway 200 Bonner to Greenough, Evaro Hill, and Highway 83 Seeley Lake to Condon * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light freezing rain is occurring and is expected to create slick conditions for the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Clark Fork Region; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region
